name: John Farnor
text: We ordered a mushroom pizza and we're happy with the service and the pizza.  The young woman who took our order made us feel like we were her favorite customers.  Before she started to prepare the pizza, she made sure to wash her hands, a nice and comforting touch.  Whenever we're in the area we will go back to that Little Caesars.

name: Watch Next mix Gold
text: Great nice people!

name: juan maria
text: Today I decide to get some pizza with my friends and found out Timothy J was working diligently by himself. Gave me great service while running the register, making the pizzas, and taking care of the customers.    Outstanding work Timothy, thank you.

name: Harriette Shope
text: Everything is high quality with fresh.  The portions are generous and frequently feed me for two lunches.  Very friendly staff and fast service.

name: Ryan Robbins
text: Nothing  was hot and ready And it was a Friday who is managing this place false advertising

text: Called 4 Time‚Äôs wouldn‚Äôt answer the phone to order a take and go pepperoni pizza. Wouldn‚Äôt answer the phone. Get there couldn‚Äôt take my order. Horrible service !

name: C West
text: The service was good. The people were friendly and polite.  The store was clean in spite of the awful weather. Of course, the pizza was hot and delicious as always. Woodmen Rd. and Gayton Rd. are 2 more awesome locations too!

name: Austin Mitchell
text: I have never gotten delivery from here but have picked up orders multiple times.  The service is kind of slow when you are picking up and many times the hot and ready are not ready but take about 5 min so that isn't a big deal.  The pretzle crust pizza is the bomb though that's for real.

name: norm gallaher
text: Great staff, good prices and pizza

name: Blair Just
text: Great deal on delicious pizza!

name: Kaleed S.
text: I hate this store its always a forever long wait no matter what time u go its jus ridiculous ..i womt be going back again it makes no since for every single time i go in there is a long wait even if the store is empty the show no urgency nor care for ppl its a crying out shame

name: WhoDatRva
text: The entire marketing campaign is hot and READY.  When I have to wait 10 minutes for a pizza, it doesn‚Äôt meet one of these.

text: Excellent pizza for the price...thin crust pepperoni is the best...can't beat it for 6.00

name: H. S.
text: Love the pizza there. Its $5 lunch special (small deep dish pizza plus a 20 ounce bottle of soft drink) for weekdays is a great deal for the solo pizza lover lunch.

name: Moqadasa s.s
text: I had to wait little longer but it worth. Best pizza i ate so far from any little Caesars .. nice staff.

name: Desmond Suarez II
text: It is good value for ok pizza. It is a good use of $5.

name: Carrie West
text: This place is even better because Alijuah West works there!

name: Christopher Durden
text: This is definitely one of the better Little Caesars I've been to. The hot n readys always seem like they just came out of the oven.

name: Angela R
text: Great service great pizzas.

name: Tom Coleman
text: Always friendly and do a great job making non-dairy specialty pizza for my kids all the time.

name: Al
text: A very good LC. I've only had to wait for a few minutes one time, and my fat self goes here pretty often. They don't overcharge like THE LC in my hometown and the pizza is great for the price.

text: Always hot fresh and ready!
